text.firstParticipantMessage: You're one of the first participants! Wait for instructions.
text.commandSuccessfulMessage: Excellent! They will now get a reward.
text.commandUnsuccessfulMessage: That's unfortunate. They will not be rewarded.
text.masterTimedOutMessage: Sorry, you waited too long, you no longer have control over the room.
text.confirmCommandPrompt: Did at least {0} {1} follow your command?
text.masterToFollowerMessage: You've had your chance to give orders; now you are in the pool of order-followers. Don't worry, fantastic rewards can be yours if you play along.
text.userReactivatedMessage: You've rejoined the game; reply QUIT to leave.
